channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 00:58 Driven anxiety in the Kherson region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 游릭 00:58 Driven anxiety in the Kherson region.Creck on further messages.#Kherson_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 00:58 Driven your alarm to the Rivne region.Creat by further messages.
item.description: 游릭 00:58 Driven your alarm to the Rivne region.Creat by further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
